title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not appearing without a dataset
OB: When attempting to create a new group, the group dialog does not appear when no dataset is selected.
EB: Bug 120216: The group dialog should be displayed even when a dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Groups' section.
3. Try to create a new group.
4. Notice that the group dialog does not appear, and it should, even if no dataset is selected.
